name: Shahan Arshad Khan
profession: Data Analyst & Full Stack Web Developer
aboutMe: I’m an Analyst and Web Developer passionate about tackling complex problems. I build web applications, analyze large datasets, create visualizations, and automate workflows through code. I also designed a custom keyboard layout, ORNATE, which is more efficient than the traditional QWERTY layout. My expertise includes research, analysis, programming, visualization and dashboard development, data-driven insights, and financial modeling and forecasting.

projects.description: Published a refactored, type-safe fork of an NPM package for managing HTTP errors with extended properties across any framework.
Developed an open-source app for tracking user purchases, product prices, and associated tax rates.
Built a single-page application (SPA) with custom web components leveraging the Shadow DOM in vanilla JavaScript.
Developed a single-page application (SPA) using vanilla JavaScript with custom web components encapsulated in the Shadow DOM.
Designed an optimized keyboard layout to improve typing speed and comfort, based on scientific metrics such as Finger Travel Distance, Same-Finger Bigram Utilization, and Total Effort scores.
Developed an open-source Python bot that automatically sends personalized greetings to contacts on special occasions.
Created visualizations and dashboards using Tableau, PowerBI, Matplotlib and Seaborn for presentation to businesses and government.
Developed financial models for companies in the pharmaceutical, cement, fertilizer, and banking sectors, including a UBL financial model for the CFA Research Challenge 2015.
Developed an export strategy model for Pakistan’s Ministry of Commerce.

projects.projectName: Time Series Analysis of WhatsApp Group chats
projects.description: Wrote scripts to conduct time series analysis on data extracted from WhatsApp group chats.

projects.projectName: Machine Learning Project: Bank Defaulter Classifier
projects.description: Developed a bank loan default classification model.

projects.projectName: Machine Learning Project: Traffic Severity Predictor
projects.description: Built a traffic accident severity classification model.
Developed a PostgreSQL database for Pakistan’s export and import data.
Developed an Excel-based distribution and financial model, conducted market research, and produced strategic recommendations for launching a bulk water format in the market.

workExperience.jobDescription: Conducted economic analyses and produced comprehensive reports. Carried out fieldwork including factory visits, surveys, interviews, and data compilation. Engaged with government bodies to promote improvements in Pakistan’s business environment.

projectsExecuted.name: Authored reports on Pakistan’s Surgical and Cutlery industries.
Applied machine learning to analyze the impact of Brexit on Pakistan-UK trade and published the findings.
Evaluated Pakistan’s performance under the EU GSP Plus scheme and produced a corresponding report.

impact.name: Developed and maintained an SQL database with approximately 80 million records.
Introduced the use of BI tools such as Tableau and Power BI for visualization and dashboard creation.

workExperience.jobDescription: Conducted economic analyses of Pakistan and other countries to develop policy recommendations aimed at enhancing export growth.

projectsExecuted.name: Led the development of Pakistan’s first online e-commerce export platform, pakistantradeportal.gov.pk, under the Trade Development Authority of Pakistan (TDAP) and the Ministry of Commerce.
Developed the National Export Strategy model, representing Pakistan’s complete export framework, for presentation to the Advisor at the Ministry of Commerce.
Formulated budgets to support TDAP’s annual trade exhibition programs.

impact.name: Invited by the Ministry of Commerce to present a strategy for increasing exports to the United States.

workExperience.employer: Karachi School of Business & Leadership / NED University
workExperience.jobDescription: Developed financial models and analyzed revenue channels to identify optimization opportunities at KSBL. / Taught courses in cost accounting and business finance at NED.

projectsExecuted.name: Conducted financial modeling and budgeting to support strategic planning initiatives.
Assisted the University in launching new undergraduate programs.

impact.name: Led to the launch of three new programs, including a Master’s in Business Analytics and two undergraduate degrees.

workExperience.jobDescription: Performed risk assessments for both prospective and current corporate clients.

projectsExecuted.name: Conducted analysis of Pakistan’s sugar industry.
Assessed industry-wide exposures of Pakistani banks.

impact.name: Advised the CRO on sector-level exposure management.

workExperience.jobDescription: Handled bookkeeping, prepared CVP analyses for each charter, coordinated vessel fixtures and documentation compliance among parties, calculated demurrage, and drafted bank instructions.

projectsExecuted.name: Conducted cost analysis for launching imported French bakery products in Singapore.

impact.name: Led the implementation of the MYOB accounting system, improving efficiency and reducing time spent on bookkeeping.
